dm.message_forwarded: Your message has been forwarded to the bot developer.

missing_user_permission.1: You may not use this command because you are missing the following required permission: `%s`
missing_user_permission.default: You may not use this command because you are missing the following required permissions: `%s`

missing_bot_permission.1: This command cannot be used because Yot is missing the following required permission: `%s`
missing_bot_permission.default: This command cannot be used because Yot is missing the following required permissions: `%s`

error.bot_cannot_have_warn: User %s cannot have warnings because it is a bot.
error.report_error: Please report this error to the bot developer by sending Yot a direct message.
error.advertising_not_allowed: Advertising is not allowed on this server!

kick_warn_fail.1: %s could not be kicked for reaching %d warning: %s.
kick_warn_fail.default: %s could not be kicked for reaching %d warnings: %s.

kick_auto_warn_fail.1: %s could not be kicked for automatically reaching %d warning: %s.
kick_auto_warn_fail.default: %s could not be kicked for automatically reaching %d warnings: %s.

ban_warn_fail.1: %s could not be banned for reaching %d warning: %s.
ban_warn_fail.default: %s could not be banned for reaching %d warnings: %s.

ban_auto_warn_fail.1: %s could not be banned for automatically reaching %d warning: %s.
ban_auto_warn_fail.default: %s could not be banned for automatically reaching %d warnings: %s.

error.user_not_in_guild: They are not in this server.
error.bot_below_user: Yot's highest role (%s) is not higher than their highest role (%s).
error.setting_object_gone: The object set as the `%s` setting has been removed or is no longer visible to Yot.
error.bot_below_role: Yot's highest role (%s) is not higher than %s.

warn.try_refresh: Does something seem wrong? Try %swarnings refresh
warn.refreshed_no_changes: Successfully refreshed your warnings. No changes were made.
warn.refreshed_set_active: Successfully refreshed your warnings. `is_active` was set to true.

you_warned_auto.1: You have been automatically warned in **%s**. You now have %d warning.
you_warned_auto.default: You have been automatically warned in **%s**. You now have %d warnings.

user_warned_auto.1: %s has been automatically warned. They now have %d warning.
user_warned_auto.default: %s has been automatically warned. They now have %d warnings.

you_kicked_auto.1: You have been kicked from **%s** for automatically reaching %d warning.
you_kicked_auto.default: You have been kicked from **%s** for automatically reaching %d warnings.

user_kicked_auto.1: %s has been kicked for automatically reaching %d warning.
user_kicked_auto.default: %s has been kicked for automatically reaching %d warnings.

you_banned_auto.1: You have been banned from **%s** for automatically reaching %d warning.
you_banned_auto.default: You have been banned from **%s** for automatically reaching %d warnings.

user_banned_auto.1: %s has been banned for automatically reaching %d warning.
user_banned_auto.default: %s has been banned for automatically reaching %d warnings.

footer.cmd_usage: Angled brackets represent required arguments. Square brackets represent optional arguments. Do not include the brackets in the command. All values are case sensitive.
footer.warn_info:
Time until a warning is removed: %s
Warnings until kick: %s
Warnings until ban: %s
Active: %s

warnings.description: Show how many warnings you have, or how many someone else has.

warnings refresh.description: Use this command if something seems wrong with your warnings, such as being marked as inactive even when you're in the server.

message-edit-logger.description: Logs edited messages in the staff log channel.

message-delete-logger.description: Logs deleted messages in the staff log channel.

persistent-roles-leave.description: Cache persistent roles when users leave.

mute-manager-leave.description: Set is_active to 0 when users with mutes leave.

warning-manager-leave.description: Set is_active to 0 when users with warnings leave.

youtube-anti-ad.description: Deletes messages containing YouTube video links in which the video uploader's name matches the user's, and warns the users who posted them. A role ignored by this module may be set using the `advertising_allowed_role` setting.
